Why are dental treatments so much cheaper in Istanbul?

Dental treatments in Istanbul cost significantly less due to lower operational costs, favorable exchange rates, and government incentives for healthcare tourism, while maintaining world-class quality and using the same premium materials and technology as Western clinics.
Are there any hidden costs I should be aware of?

No, the prices shown include the complete treatment cost. However, additional procedures may be recommended by the dentist after your initial examination if medically necessary. These would be discussed with you before proceeding.
Do these prices include guarantees or warranty?
Yes, all treatments come with guarantees as indicated in the quote. These guarantees are honored internationally, and we work only with clinics that stand behind their work.
How do I pay for my treatment?
You can pay directly at the clinic using credit card or cash. Most clinics also accept bank transfers. No upfront payment is required to secure your appointment through Istanbul Dental Smile.

Raj Singh founded Istanbul Dental Smile after his own transformative dental tourism experience in Istanbul. With over 10 years in healthcare management, Raj combines his business expertise with personal passion to provide exceptional dental tourism services.
